subject: [Q] Should TestDecorator/TestSetup extend from Test Suite?
msgSnippet: Well, it s a simple question. :) The reason I m suggesting this is that the lovely Test Hierarchy panel in the Swing Test Runner does not work properly if you
messageBody:
Well, it's a simple question. :)

The reason I'm suggesting this is that the lovely Test Hierarchy panel in
the Swing Test Runner does not work properly if you have wrapped your test
suite inside of a Testsetup. It's fairly easy to fix (by re-implementing
TestSetup and extending it from TestSuite), but it's annoying.

Other tools, like Ant's JUnit task, could also benefit from this.

I have an implementation I'm willing to submit, but I would like to know how
many people would be interested in it. How many people actually use
TestDecorators (or TestSetups)?

Robert.

--
"Software is too expensive to build cheaply"
Robert Watkins Software Engineer QSI Payments Inc.
